categories.name: Staff
categories.description: Apply to become a staff member

questions.text: Why do you want to join the staff team?
Do you have any previous staff experience?
How many hours per week can you dedicate?

categories.name: Moderator
categories.description: Apply to become a moderator and help maintain the community

questions.text: How long have you been in this community?
Why do you want to be a moderator?
Have you moderated any servers before?
How would you handle a heated argument between members?
Can you commit to being active daily?
What experience do you have in HR or recruitment?
Why are you interested in HR for this community?
Are you comfortable handling sensitive information?
How many hours weekly can you dedicate to HR duties?
